container-title: A BLACK LIBRARY PUBLICATION Published in Great Britain in 2017 by Black Library, Games Workshop Ltd, Willow Road, Nottingham, NG7 2WS, UK. Produced by Games Workshop in Nottingham. Cover illustration by Mark Holmes
title: As the Indomitus Crusade draws to a close, Roboute Guilliman returns to Ultramar to face a new threat – the pestilential Death Guard!

note: A CIP record for this book is available from the British Library.
